评论详情: I have both Lulu and this one. I barely can see difference. Love it

I ordered this shirt in white, size medium, after seeing an influencer sing its praises. I’ve had great success with the CRZ Yoga Butterlift leggings, but this shirt misses the mark. The quality is giving paper napkin. But that might be doing a disservice to napkins. There were also lots of loose strings around the seams.  I love the fit of the shirt. The tunic style is just right and the boatneck is stylish. But in order for me to recommend this shirt to someone else, the brand would have to significantly improve the quality of the fabric. Overall I am disappointed and wish I’d spent more money on something that didn’t feel so cheaply made.

I bought this as I needed new basic shirts and liked this one so well I bought it in 2 additional colors. I'm a mid-size woman, and I like the relaxed fit. The fabric is thin but soft. Styles easily, and fit true to size (measurements on site seem to be smaller than reality).

I bought a top from this brand for the first time, and was surprised by the quality. The shirt is unbelievably light, matetial is very thin and pleasant to skin. I can wear it both for a workout or with jeans! Great price-quality balance ! Will buy second one in other color
This looks exactly like the Lulu top i have…fit is the same.
Nice color. Very comfortable.

I love the color and the soft material. I love that it’s not a petal hem and that the material drapes well without being clingy. My complaint is that the shoulder seam has this weird pucker that has persisted even after washing. Not bad enough to make me not wear it, just annoying.

I have purchased these in several colors. I also own several with short sleeves. I absolutely LOVE how they fit. They are just the right amount of loose without looking too loose. I appreciate the length in the back as they cover everything I want covered. (I’m in my 50’s but they’re great for any age) The wider neckline flatters my body type. I do not like crew necks, I can appear to be wearing a table cloth. The fabric is super soft and they hold up well thru countless wash cycles. I rate this shirt 5 stars and all thumbs up.
Love this top’
I love the fit!! This is thin but very comfortable and light. I have received compliment.  Purchased 2 more.
Very comfy, true to size! So soft
The fit of this shirt is perfect. It is not scratchy when I workout in it and long enough in the back that I am not pulling my shirt down constantly when I am on the treadmill.
This is a great every day wearable shirt that goes well with joggers. I love it and will be ordering more.
Wanted to love it but the fabric is incredibly thin!! Not worth the price at all.
This is a great, loose, workout shirt. Cut is actually quite stylish in the boxy, minimalist way. This grayish, violet color is beautiful.

Definitely purchasing more colors.  It’s affordable, it’s soft, and you save alot instead of purchasing the LLLemon brand. The stitching is exactly the same. I bought XL and Im a 38DD and it fits with room, as I dont like these type of shirts to fit me too snug and the XL was the perfect size.

I'm 5"3 150 lbs with a momma pooch and bought a medium. This top is very flattering, not boxy but not clingy. Longer in back, so great with leggings. The material is like butter and the color Slate blue is a nice creamy blue green. If you have larger upper arms, it may be a smidge tight, but the material is stretchy. I call this one a win!

The fit and feel of this top is great but I returned it because of the color.  I ordered the Milky White/Bone but what I received had an ugly greenish tint to it.

评论概述: Perfect for the change of seasons
评论详情: So soft, light, and flowy! Perfect shirt for transitional seasons. Perfect color and fits true to size. over sized in the back

The shirt is OK, but there are 2 major drawbacks for me. First, the fabric. Even though it’s mostly cotton, it feels very much like a purely synthetic material on me. I prefer natural fabrics, and this one just doesn’t feel like one. Second, it fits really strange around the neck. As I walk and move around, the shirt creeps up my neck to the point where I’m constantly pulling it down. If the fabric was different, maybe I wouldn’t notice it as much, but as is, it annoys me to no end. Overall, when I wear this thing, I am acutely aware of having it on, and I can’t wait to take it off. They clearly tried to create a specific look and design, but didn’t quite make it. In my opinion, the pattern is all wrong.

I loved it, it wrinkles easily but I don’t mind that I just use a wrinkle releaser spray on it. Super cooling, doesn’t make me sweat like some other tops I own that trap the heat. Should def give it a try.
The fabric is cheap and doesn't flow well. The arms are for a 12yr old. I also bought another short sleeve top and it was just as bad. I do not recommend at all.
Comfortable fit. I have several of these!

While I love this brand, this is the first disappointing item I’ve purchased. It’s thinner than I expected for the price. I wasn’t a fan of how it laid across the waistline. I will continue to but CRZ yoga items, this shirt was a miss for me.
Love this shirt … have it in three colors and going to buy yet another in grey.  It is nice and boxy - good coverage - breathable material - can wear it in a range of temperatures.

Third time buying this shirt (in different color). I differ from the other reviews in that the first time I ordered this I ordered M, my second two orders have been L but I like the looser fit. This is a great brand. Makes it hard to justify spending $ on higher end brands when you can get this.

Crazy Yoga I love their gear! The butterluxe line is my fav. 28” high waist yoga pant with pockets, high neck long line Racerback and U back sports bras, high waisted A line tennis skirts, 4” high waisted running shorts, and long sleeve pima cotton workout shirts have become staples. They wash well on cold, hang to dry. Retain shape, no fading noted, no shrinking with the wash method above. Wear so comfortably. I wear all the above daily. The colors and styles mimic Lu you know who. Fit has been spot on with the size charts. I read reviews to determine best match. This is my new go to! I have bought many Lululemon shirts just like this at about $60 a pop!  After about 10 washes they start to get holes in them. It is like the lulu shirt had a baby but made it better!  It feels like a lulu, it fits like a lulu, but surprise surprise it washes BETTER than a lulu! 评论概述: Sizing is a bit off, but comfortable and will reorder smaller
评论详情: Sizing is a bit off, but overall very comfortable and will reorder smaller. I am 5'11" and ordered this in a size large. Overall the shirt is great. The fabric is nice, but comes very wrinkly. There is this odd band of fabric in the center back that is odd...it creates this odd pouf right in your lower back above your butt. This "band" has visible seams and really doesn't add anything to the shirt it just makes the center wider. So with that being said, I think this is the reason this top runs big. I will return and try a medium. The sleeve length of the large is good. The stretch is great without being too stretchy. This top is perfect for all kind of activity like yoga, pilates, running, etc BUT can also be worn as nice casual top with jeans

I recently added the CRZ YOGA Long Sleeve Workout Shirts to my activewear collection, and they have quickly become a staple in my workout wardrobe. These shirts effortlessly blend comfort and performance, making them a standout choice for any fitness enthusiast.  What impressed me from the start was the thoughtful design of these shirts. The fabric feels lightweight and breathable, providing excellent moisture-wicking properties during intense workouts. The long sleeves offer added coverage without compromising on flexibility, making them ideal for various exercises.  The versatility of these workout shirts extends beyond the gym. I find myself reaching for them during outdoor activities and casual outings as well. The stylish design and attention to detail make them a reliable choice whether I'm working up a sweat or simply going about my day.  Similar to other CRZ YOGA products I own, these workout shirts deliver on quality without the hefty price tag. The durability of the fabric and stitching reassures me that they will withstand the rigors of regular use.  For women seeking reliable, high-performance workout shirts that seamlessly transition from the gym to everyday activities, the CRZ YOGA Long Sleeve Workout Shirts are a fantastic option. I highly recommend them for their comfort, functionality, and stylish design. A must-have for any active lifestyle!
Comfortable shirt. I like the way it fits.

size up. This runs very short in the sleeves.  The fabric is soft.  It would be perfect for a petite person but I am 5”9”.  I went one size bigger and it looks really boxy on me.  Choice to return.
